text: Any of you have like a sitting position that instantly gets you in your head deep. I find that when I get home and finally unwind I always end up sitting on the edge of my bed with my arms on my legs and I'm leaning forward with my head tilting to the left. I just sit there sometimes for like 30 min then I'm like whoa, ive been sitting here a while just thinking, about too many thingsğŸ˜… Its a really comfortable position for me to think I believe .
